paragrafi: My name is Elisa and you can find me online as Miaographics.

I am a Graphic Designer and Content Creator, and I am here to be your partner in defining your company's visual identity. I can create a custom logo for you, tailored to your strategic needs and mission, with a unique design that helps you stand out and differentiate yourself from competitors.
I assist small and medium-sized businesses in achieving their business goals through in-depth analysis of the product/service, market, and target audience.
paragrafi2: I can offer you customized solutions tailored to your budget and goals. My aim is to help you establish a strong image and consistent communication that sets you apart from the competition, attracts new customers, and fosters growth.
To me, it's essential to understand your story, your reality, and your business goals.
Through an introductory meeting, which can also be conducted online, I'll be able to grasp your needs and develop a visual communication tailored just for you.
sezioneUno.title: /sectionsTitle/welcome_title.png

sezioneDue.title: /pageImg/serviceTitle_en.png
sezioneDue.descrizione: Graphic design and visual communication are the invisible art that permeates our world. It's much more than just images and colors; they are powerful tools that shape our perceptions and guide our decisions.
sezioneDue.descrizione2: In a digital era where attention is a precious commodity, well-thought-out design captures the eye and holds attention. It's the difference between being noticed or ignored.
sezioneDue.descrizione3: Visual communication is the tool that transforms ideas into reality, giving life to a brand and communicating high-impact sensory content that captures the attention of the target audience.

sezioneTre.paragrafo1: My mission is to assist small businesses in defining a unique and effective corporate identity. This process is crucial for standing out from the competition and strengthening one's presence both online and offline. I create visual and textual content aligned with business objectives, engaging the right audience.

sezioneQuattro.title: /pageImg/blogTitle2_en.png

presentazione: Since I was a child, I've used my hands to shape objects and draw characters from my imagination. A craftswoman at heart and in practice, I've been participating with my booth at the Foire de Saint-Ours for years, creating handmade items.

After studying at IED in Turin, I opened my creative workshop in 2008 under the name l’heartelier. For the past few years, I've been traveling between Milan and Aosta, and I decided to renew my identity, becoming Miao graphics - itinerant graphics just like me (always with a suitcase in hand).
As a professional graphic designer, I offer comprehensive creative solutions to help your business stand out and thrive. My work philosophy is based on collaboration and understanding your needs.
Together, we'll craft a tailor-made creative journey for you.
Every brand has a story to tell, and I'm here to transform it into a unique design. My goal is to capture your idea and translate it into a memorable visual identity (logo, packaging, illustration).
Contact me today to start this exciting creative journey!

sezioneQuattro.title: /sectionsTitle/mitha_title.png
paragrafi: Moreover, there's Mitha, a creative idea that was born almost as a game, a challenge between me and Thallion+dev, a talented web designer who also created my website. I've always sought to surround myself with determined professionals who are resolute in pursuing their goals.
This shared project is an opportunity for clients, as in Mitha, they can find all the solutions they need without having to look elsewhere.  Stay tuned!

logo.name: Logo Design
logo.introTitle: Together, Let's Design a Custom Logo for Your Business
intro: An effective logo design has a lasting impact on how a company is perceived over time.
It's a fundamental part of the branding strategy, contributing to building the brand's reputation and recognition in the long run.
If you're starting a new business and don't yet have a distinctive logo that best represents your company, you're in the right place!
Do you need a tailor-made visual identity that perfectly aligns with your mission and resonates with your target audience?
logo.title: /serviziImg/logo_Title.png
descPro: We will create a unique logo for your business that clearly identifies your activities and the products/services offered to your target audience.
list: 1 logo in vector format (pdf), ideal for any printed and/or typographic communication
1 logo in web format (jpeg and gif), perfect for your social media and online channels
1 usage manual with brand guidelines
logo.descrizione: A custom-designed logo, tailored to your target audience and your vision, is an investment in your company's success.
logo.titleOpzioni: Why settle for less? Here are more customized options for you:
logo.descOpzioni: We will collaborate with Francesca, a highly talented web designer, to create a professional website that strengthens your corporate identity and consolidates your online presence. Leveraging her expertise, I present these options:

branding.name: Branding Strategy
branding.title: /serviziImg/branding_Title.png
intro: My mission is to go beyond creating a simple logo

I want to help you define the complete image of your company, from start to finish, carefully analyzing your vision, mission, and target audience. Together, we will develop a tailor-made marketing strategy that breathes life into your corporate identity, making it unique, recognizable, and memorable.
Branding is not limited to logo design; it involves a series of specific and targeted actions aimed at communicating and consolidating your brand's image within your target market.
We want your 'brand' to stand out with a coordinated image, meticulously crafted in every detail, capable of supporting all your marketing initiatives to the fullest.
I'm here to make you stand out and help you distinguish yourself from your competitors!
descPro: Following an introductory call, we will analyze your mission, vision, target audience, and your products/services together.
We will then define the necessary tools to build a marketing strategy that strengthens your corporate identity and helps you achieve your goals.
list: A tailored strategic plan designed specifically for you based on your objectives and target audience.
branding.descrizione: A good branding strategy allows you to stand out from the competition and build a strong, unique, and recognizable identity.
branding.titleOpzioni: Why settle for less? Here are more customized options for you:
branding.descOpzioni: We will collaborate with Francesca, a highly talented web designer, to create a professional website that strengthens your corporate identity and consolidates your online presence. Leveraging her expertise, I present these options:

label.name: Label & Packaging
label.title: /serviziImg/label_Title.png
label.introTitle: Packaging and Labels: Give Your Product a Voice!
intro: We often take label and packaging design for granted, but in reality, they are the true 'ambassadors' of our product.
Imagine walking through a supermarket and noticing a product with attractive packaging and a label that conveys a sense of quality and personality.
These details not only capture your attention but also communicate the inherent value of the product.
And you know what? They can make the difference between choosing that product or leaving it on the shelves.

In today's world, immersed in an increasingly competitive market, label and packaging design become even more crucial. They not only capture the audience's interest but also contribute to creating a memorable shopping experience.
I'm here to help you choose the best container for your product and dress it up with a unique and appealing look.
descPro: Together, we can analyze the most suitable packaging for your product and define a cohesive graphic design that aligns with it.
list: Selection of the most suitable container for your product
Creation of a master label based on the chosen container's measurements (2 graphic drafts)
Mock-up for size and visual verification
Potential graphic variations (product line)
Supplier research
Provision of digital artwork for printing and initiation of the printing process
label.descrizione: Label and packaging design are essential for a product's success. In a competitive market, they are crucial for capturing the interest of the audience and informing the consumer.

intro: Social media management and the creation of quality content are the keys to online success.
With us, you'll gain a specific, personalized, and effective digital presence.
We understand the secrets to engaging your audience, building brand awareness, and generating tangible results.
Don't miss the opportunity to fully leverage the potential of social media, enhancing your brand's online image!
descPro: To help you define an editorial plan based on your business objectives.
list: A personalized strategic editorial plan based on your goals and target audience
Comprehensive monthly management of Meta channels (according to your needs)
Tailor-made content created specifically for you, capable of generating leads

campagne.name: Offline Campaigns
campagne.title: /pageImg/campagne_Title.png
campagne.introTitle: Rediscover the Power of Offline Campaigns: Emotions, Trust, and Accessibility in the real World
intro: In the fast-paced and digitized world we live in, it might seem like attention is solely focused on the online realm. But in an era where our eyes are glued to screens and our devices keep us constantly connected, there's a world outside that we should never underestimate: the realm of offline campaigns.
Unlike online ads, they bring tangible benefits such as:

Eliciting emotions: a poster, a flyer, or a live event can evoke feelings that are hard to achieve through a screen. The sensation of holding a product, feeling its texture, absorbing information at one's own pace, and more, can create a profound impact.
Building trust: people tend to trust what they can see, touch, and directly experience. Offline campaigns provide this opportunity for authentic interaction.

Expanding accessibility: not everyone has constant access to the internet or is willing to share their data online. Offline campaigns reach a broader audience, including those who might otherwise be excluded from the digital world.
campagne.titleList: How to Create a Successful Offline Campaign:
list: Choose the Right Billboards: Select appropriate spaces for posters and billboards, ensuring they are strategically placed for maximum visibility
Feature in Local Newspapers: Plan appearances in local newspapers that align with your target audience, securing placements to reach the right demographic
Design Compelling Graphics: Create visually appealing and engaging graphics that align with your message. The design should be eye-catching and effectively convey your intended message
Diverse Poster Formats: Develop various formats for posters to cater to different spaces and contexts. Having versatile designs ensures adaptability for different advertising locations
Design Postcards or Flyers: Create postcards or flyers for manual distribution, allowing for a personal touch in delivering your message. These can be handed out directly to potential customers

Support with Custom Merchandise: Enhance your initiative with specially designed gadgets or merchandise. These items can reinforce your campaign message and serve as tangible reminders for your audience
campagne.descrizione: Offline campaigns shape choices, create connections, and convey deep messages, embodying ideas, values, and brands that people touch, feel, and remember.
campagne.titleOpzioni: Why settle for less? Here are more customized options for you:
campagne.descOpzioni: We will collaborate with Francesca, a highly talented web designer, to create a professional website that strengthens your corporate identity and consolidates your online presence. Leveraging her expertise, I present these options:

allestimenti.name: Stage Design
allestimenti.title: /pageImg/allestimenti_Title.png
allestimenti.introTitle: Choose a Setup to Promote Your Brand
intro: A customized setup is a powerful tool that transforms a simple space into a communicative environment. Setups, whether in trade shows or retail settings, are key to capturing attention, evoking emotions, and ensuring your brand stands out.

In trade show contexts, a personalized setup puts your brand in the spotlight, grabbing attention and creating a memorable experience. In retail, it turns customers' visits into a total immersion in your world.
Custom setups serve as a potent communication tool. They can convey clear and memorable messages, assisting you in achieving your marketing and promotional objectives.
descPro: To help you customize your retail space or find tailored solutions together to showcase your products effectively in trade show environments or third-party locations.
allestimenti.descrizione: Custom setups give personality to an empty space. They can evoke emotions, create atmospheres, and engage the audience uniquely.
allestimenti.titleOpzioni: Why settle for less? Here are more customized options for you:
allestimenti.descOpzioni: We will collaborate with Francesca, a highly talented web designer, to create a professional website that strengthens your corporate identity and consolidates your online presence. Leveraging her expertise, I present these options:

illustrazione.name: Illustrations
illustrazione.title: /pageImg/illustrazione_Title.png
illustrazione.introTitle: Custom Illustrations Strengthen Your Brand Image
intro: Custom illustrations serve as the signature of your brand. They can capture the essence of your corporate identity in an image, making your brand instantly recognizable and memorable.
Images speak more intensely than words, and custom illustrations constitute a universal language. They can convey emotions, concepts, and stories in an instant, without the need for explanations.
In a world saturated with generic visual content, custom illustrations set you apart. They make your brand unique, appealing, and irresistible to the audience's eyes.
Custom patterns created through illustrations add coherence and recognizability to all your marketing materials. They enable the creation of communicative harmony between the brand and the product.
descPro: To create tailored images that reflect your taste and your brand's values.
illustrazione.descrizione: Tailor-made illustrations are more than just images; they are key elements that enhance your brand and make it unique and memorable.
illustrazione.sottoList: According to your needs, we will create for you:
list: Vector Graphics
Digital Illustrations
Handcrafted Mixed-Media Illustrations
Patterns
...and other visual elements to enhance your communication
illustrazione.titleOpzioni: Why settle for less? Here are more customized options for you:
illustrazione.descOpzioni: We will collaborate with Francesca, a highly talented web designer, to create a professional website that strengthens your corporate identity and consolidates your online presence. Leveraging her expertise, I present these options:

content.name: Content Creator
content.title: /serviziImg/content_Title.png
content.introTitle: Engage Your Target Audience with Tailor-Made Content
intro: Creating tailor-made content, be it photos, videos, or texts, is the magical formula for success on social media and beyond. That's why you should make personalization an absolute priority.

Customized content allows you to build a direct bridge between your brand and your audience. Every photo and every word can be adapted to reflect the values, voice, and unique personality of your brand, establishing an authentic connection with your followers.

Personalization isn't limited to social media. You can extend it to your promotional materials, creating a cohesive and recognizable image of your brand wherever it appears. This consistency strengthens your presence and credibility.
list: Creation of digital content (custom-designed graphics)
Production of photographic and video content on-site, tailored to your marketing objectives
Development of textual content in line with your communication style, designed to resonate with your target audience
Creation of SEO-friendly textual content based on the most searched keywords in your industry
Research of high-performing hashtags and keywords
content.descrizione: In today's digital world, content plays an increasingly important role. But it's not just about quantity; it's about quality and, most importantly, personalization.
content.titleOpzioni: Why settle for less? Here are more customized options for you:
content.descOpzioni: We will collaborate with Francesca, a highly talented web designer, to create a professional website that strengthens your corporate identity and consolidates your online presence. Leveraging her expertise, I present these options:

intro: A selection of works that visually narrate the services I offer.
Check out all the case studies :)

worksItem.name: Horto Sapiens
worksItem.title: horto
worksItem.descrizione: Typical Products from Monte Amiata and Val d'Orcia

worksItem.name: Isavivai
worksItem.title: isavivai
worksItem.descrizione: The Green That Moves You - Nursery, Greenhouse

ansermè.name: Ansermé
ansermè.title: anserme

keywords.nome: BIO, Mountain Beekeeping, Minimalism, Craftsmanship, BIO Goodness

desc: With Alessandro, we envisioned creating a modern graphic concept with vibrant colors to enhance the organic product line, making them easily recognizable and setting them apart from the competition.

descrizione: In collaboration with Alessandro, we defined a range of vibrant and vivid colors, available in various shades, to create a pleasant contrast with the dark and neutral background (recycled paper effect) of the labels.

illustrazioni.descrizione: To characterize the product line, a stylized bee was created, with the color of its wings varying based on the type of honey, biscuit, or cosmetic.
illustrazioni.descrizione2: To promote the 'Adopt a Hive' initiative, I also stylized a beehive and high mountain flowers.

descrizione: Specially crafted photographic images and textual and visual content for the promotion of products and the company.

becquet.name: Samuel Becquet
becquet.title: becquet
desc: Alongside Samuel, we developed a new visual identity for his company, transforming locally sourced agricultural products into ready-to-use dried fruits and vegetables for teas, soups, and toppings for yogurts and ice creams.

descrizione: Samuel and I chose neutral colors reminiscent of the earth to highlight the traditional dried products of Valle d'Aosta.
To echo the colors of the Valdostan flag, we incorporated a ladybug (a symbol of authenticity itself) into the graphics, using a very dark brown instead of black.

illustrazioni.descrizione: We opted for a modern, streamlined communication style, using high-contrast photographic images with vector elements in the colors of the described product.

reve.name: Le Rêve en Vert
reve.title: reve

keywords.nome: Local, Dream, Green, Garden, Colors, Patterns

desc: With Andrea, we revamped the original logo and developed a complete branding line.
This strategy involved creating a coordinated image for the transformed products and promotion through high-quality printed materials, both inside the store and outside.

descrizione: In collaboration with Andrea, we chose to use a range of green shades as the basis for our communication, aiming to reflect the nuances found in his local garden.

illustrazioni.descrizione: Per realizzare i pattern abbiamo creato delle illustrazioni a mano libera, convertite successivamente in formato vettoriale.

phillacolor.name: Phillacolor
phillacolor.title: phillacolor
desc: For a sustainable and innovative concept, Laura and I developed a communication strategy to highlight the product's philosophy, made only with natural and sustainable raw materials.

descrizione: Laura and I established a color palette inspired by the green of chlorophyll and plants used to create natural dyes.

chappoz.name: Chappoz
chappoz.title: chappoz

keywords.nome: Home, Family, Corn, Cereals, Care for the Earth

desc: The goal was to create an image that represents the family-run agricultural business, cultivating corn, cereals, and vegetables in the lower valley in Donnas.

descrizione: In collaboration with Monica, we chose colors that evoke the earth, corn and maize crops, and small fruits.

illustrazioni.descrizione: Each illustration was hand-drawn with pencil and later digitized and vectorized.

descrizione: Creation of tailor-made photographic and textual content for the promotion of the company on Meta's social channels.

daemy.name: Da Emy
daemy.title: daemy

keywords.nome: Natural Park, Medicinal Herbs, Botany, Genepy

desc: Emilia and her daughter Ambra cultivate medicinal herbs and genepy in the Valsavarenche area.
We created a communication strategy that evokes the high mountains and the naturalness of the plants born in the Gran Paradiso Park.

descrizione: Emy and I decided to use the colors of the flowers and plants she cultivates, in various shades, to create a pleasant contrast with botanical illustrations.

illustrazioni.descrizione: To give the labels a completely natural style, each illustration was hand-painted with brush strokes and finished with watercolor pencil.

horto.name: Horto Sapiens
horto.title: horto
horto.descrizione: Typical Products from Monte Amiata and Val d'Orcia

cliente.payoff: Typical Products from Monte Amiata and Val d'Orcia

keywords.nome: Oil, Monte Amiata, Icons, Tuscan Hills, Color

desc: The goal was to create a line of products that reflected the quality of Tuscan raw materials used to produce aromatic oils, creatively paired jams, and honey.

descrizione: In collaboration with Andrea, we chose vibrant colors that mirrored those of the raw materials used in the products.

illustrazioni.descrizione: To distinguish each product, I created stylized vector icons, representing each item with a consistent style.

isavivai.name: Isavivai
isavivai.title: isavivai
isavivai.descrizione: The Green That Moves You - Nursery, Greenhouse

keywords.nome: The green that moves you, Modern, Minimal

desc: We created together with Chérie and Monique, a coordinated image line for the new store, and a marketing strategy for internal communication and offline promotion.

descrizione: We decided with Monique and Chérie, a pastel color palette that would identify and distinguish the internal areas of the nursery.

saintgrat.name: Saint Grat
saintgrat.title: saintgrat
desc: With Elodie, we decided to represent the distinctive shape of the chapel near the company headquarters in a stylized manner, combining it with the main production, which is apples.
For the Green line, we paid close attention to the choice of materials and their sustainability.

descrizione: We decided to keep the original green from the historic logo and instead create new contrasting colors to identify the apple juices and jams.

illustrazioni.descrizione: For the company's communication, we initially focused on a more manual drawing style that echoed the history of the company.
illustrazioni.descrizione2: For the new products in the Green line, we opted for a more modern approach using vector icons to illustrate the process of making the juices, from harvesting to bottling.

morzenti.name: Morzenti Daniele
morzenti.title: morzenti

keywords.nome: Sheep, Nomadic Shepherding, Sheep Cheese, Happy Farm, Local Vegetable Garden

desc: With Daniele, we decided to stylize the logo with a Rosset sheep, nestled among the green mountain pastures, and include it within a circle to create a sort of quality seal.
The entire strategy revolves around promotion through Meta social channels and through photographic and textual content that describes the company from every angle.

descrizione: Colors were chosen to reflect those of the earth and mountain pastures: greens, browns, and a few contrasting colors.
Every two months, I visit the farm to discuss topics with Daniele and create the editorial calendar together.
Each photo used for social media is taken on the farm and captures the life of the nomadic shepherd, farmer, and cheesemaker.
